alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 7:56AM EST until January 13 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at multiple campgrounds in the region. Water approaches homes along Bachelder Road and properties along Riverside Drive in Allenstown. Buck Street in Epsom floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 9.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
